title: Daniel Arenson, Song of Dragons, The Complete Trilogy epub [dova
description:
Book: Song of Dragons: 3-Book Bundle
    Author: Daniel Arenson

From the best selling author Daniel Arenson

    Song of Dragons, an epic fantasy series, tells a story of blood, steel, and dragonfire. This bundle contains the following novels:

BOOK 1: BLOOD OF REQUIEM -- Requiem, a kingdom of men who could become dragons, lies in ruin. Its destroyer, the tyrant Dies Irae, leads his griffins on a hunt for survivors. Will Requiem's last children perish in the wilderness... or once more become dragons and fly to war

BOOK 2: TEARS OF REQUIEM -- Dies Irae masters new servants: the nightshades, demons of shadow who fear no sword or arrow. They suck the souls from all who live, like a glutton sucking marrow from bones. Can Requiem's last children, a mere scattering of survivors, defeat them

BOOK 3: LIGHT OF REQUIEM -- The world lies in ruin. Forests smolder. The crows feast. From the ashes, Dies Irae raises new soldiers: monsters sewn together from dead body parts. As the undead army marches, Requiem's survivors muster what forces they can... and prepare for the final confrontation with Dies Irae.
    
ISBN13: 9780987886439
    ISBN10: 0987886436
